title: Legend of Wacken
overview: In Legend of Wacken, the story of how the legendary heavy metal festival came to be is fictionalized. The six-part series focuses on the two founders Thomas Jensen and Holger Hübner, who turned their dream into reality with a great deal of passion and dedication and brought the Wacken Open Air to life. The main roles of the two founders are played by Charly Hübner and Aurel Manthei.
